sentences.sContent: Romantic artists portrayed nature as wild and powerful.
sentences.sCn: 浪漫主义艺术家描绘的大自然是狂野而强大的。

sentences.sContent: His most famous painting portrayed the death of Nelson.
sentences.sCn: 他最著名的画作描绘的是纳尔逊之死。

remMethod.val: por(看作pour， 倒)+tray(碟)→将颜料倒在碟子上→描绘

words.tran: 记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tranOther: to describe or represent something or someone
